name: The Boy and The Dryad
description:
The Boy and The Dryad is a short, non-linear Greek mythology-inspired Visual Novel about a Dryad and the family she watches over.  Make choices, and see the results of your actions affect generations to come.

This game was made in 48hs during the Cornwall Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme of 'Roots' by FabledArmStudios.
